entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
